verse: Finally, I looked up and saw four chariots coming from between two bronze mountains.
The first chariot was pulled by red horses, and the second by black horses;
the third chariot was pulled by white horses, and the fourth by spotted gray horses.
“Sir,” I asked the angel. “What do these stand for?”
Then he explained, “These are the four winds of heaven, and now they are going out, after presenting themselves to the Lord of all the earth.
The chariot with black horses goes toward the north, the chariot with white horses goes toward the west, and the one with spotted horses goes toward the south.”
The horses came out eager to patrol the earth, and the angel told them, “Start patrolling the earth.”
he shouted to me, “Those that have gone to the country in the north will do what the Lord’s Spirit wants them to do there.”
When people from distant lands come and help build the temple of the Lord All-Powerful, you will know that the Lord is the one who sent me. And this will happen, if you truly obey the Lord your God.
